entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
